User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block access to admin or private areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /*.json$

# Allow specific crawlers
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://codekage.dev/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay (optional, in seconds)
Crawl-delay: 1
